amendment.description: Amendment adds language clarifying the term "express advocacy" as it applies to voting records and voting guides; and also adds language clarifying the term "professional services".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to include coverage of voter guides posted on the Internet under vote guide exception; include application of voter guide exception to guides covering 1 candidate; permit clearly identified opinions of publishers to appear on voting guides; clarify that submission and collection of voter guides is not a coordinated contribution or expenditure; clarify that lobbying candidates who hold elective office is not coordinated campaign activity; and to repeal treatment of all shared vendor services as coordinated campaign activity.

action.text: Amendment (A022) offered by Mrs. Smith, Linda to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Smith, Linda amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 343 - 84 (Roll No. 361).
